author: imario
msg: create ftpclient as soon as possible to see if host/credentials are correct

author: imario
msg: Do not issue a "list ." on the ftp-server as this might in certain (rare) cases (e.g. uu.net) force the server to do this recursive!!
in this case (".") now we issue a "list /" which means in this context the same.

author: imario
